mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test_plan (plan_name, description, project_id, status, participants, start_date, end_date, plan_version) VALUES (#{planName}, #{description}, #{projectId}, #{status}, #{participants}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{planVersion})
mapper.update: UPDATE test_plan SET plan_name = #{planName}, description = #{description}, project_id = #{projectId}, status = #{status}, participants = #{participants}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, plan_version = #{planVersion} WHERE plan_id = #{planId}
